ingredients.name: ruby dust

ingredients.name: moonstone dust
ingredients.description: Associated with the moon and the element of water

ingredients.name: amethyst dust
ingredients.description: Associated with peace, healing, and the element of air

ingredients.name: lavender sprig
ingredients.description: possesses a calming effect

ingredients.name: skullcap
ingredients.description: extremely poisonous if ingested

ingredients.name: sunflower petal
ingredients.description: associated with joy

ingredients.name: four leaf clover
ingredients.description: associated with good luck

ingredients.name: valerian root
ingredients.description: well known for its potent healing properties

ingredients.name: toadstool cap
ingredients.description: associated with transformation

ingredients.name: dandelion root
ingredients.description: a hardy plant with healing and transformative properties

ingredients.name: wolfsbane
ingredients.description: strongly associated with the lunar cycles

ingredients.name: daffodil petal
ingredients.description: the sunshine flower

ingredients.name: rose petal
ingredients.description: associated with beauty

ingredients.name: dove feather
ingredients.description: symbolic of pure love

ingredients.name: essence of ashwinder venom
ingredients.description: a highly toxic substance when concentrated

ingredients.name: phoenix feather
ingredients.description: symbolic of fire, rebirth, and healing

ingredients.name: essence of luminous salamander
ingredients.description: contains protective properties against the sun

ingredients.name: tortoise shell scales
ingredients.description: tortoise shell scales contain protective properties and are associated with good fortune

ingredients.name: giant squid ink
ingredients.description: due to its ginormous size, the giant squid developed a highly effective ink that has advanced camouflaging capabilities

ingredients.name: bowtruckle chrysalis
ingredients.description: the bowtruckle chrysalis is a rare find as the creatures are very shy and tend to hide in tall trees. They will also attack viciously if threatened.

ingredients.name: unicorn hair
ingredients.description: symbolic of pure magic, the hair of unicorn can only be collected if offered willingly from the unicorn.

ingredients.name: raven feather
ingredients.description: often associated with death and malice

ingredients.name: tawny owl feather
ingredients.description: the tawny owl is associated with wisdom and honesty
